bBTBWx-s6.memHandModelNotes: In Appalachians occurs at higher elevations of 800-1600m (Holmes 1994), in TN common at elevations from 725 m (Palmer-Ball 1996).  Probability of occurrence is halved with tracts <1000ha (Robbins et al. 1989).
